channel.title: NPC drop rates, java version
channel.description:
i am using a PI source and the drop rates are awefull... Dust devils drop dragon almost EVERY time! There are these custom ceartures called Ibanian demons... THEY HAVE A 100% RARE DROP RATE how can i edit these?
Thanks
EDIT: in my cleint folder i have a 32 bit client and a 64 bit, for the 64 bit client you NEED to have java JRE7, is it possible for it to auto detect your java JRE version? because not everyone has JRE7, they might have 5 or 6...
my client run thing:
@echo off color 0a cd ./Client/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause

item.title: NPC drop rates, java version
item.dc:creator: @KraytascapeFTW KraytascapeFTW
item.description:
@KraytascapeFTW wrote:

[quote=“Broken-Reality, post:2, topic:460434”]To Find your java you go to: computer>c:/>programe files>Java. and your JRE will be in there and also Change to this;

@echo off
color 0a
cd ./Client/
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1024m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

EDIT: Just Removed The (x86) Cause that is not where most JRE’s are located.[/quote]

but, you will still need JRE7 i asked if there was an option to make the cleitn Auto detect your Jre version

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drop rates, java version
item.dc:creator: @Broken-Reality Broken-Reality
item.description:
@Broken-Reality wrote:

To Find your java you go to: computer>c:/>programe files>Java. and your JRE will be in there and also Change to this;

color 0a
cd ./Client/
